pr_title: Add the -I 'ignore only warnings' command line option

timeline.message:
Add the -I 'ignore only warnings' command line option used in zap-baseline.py to the zap-full-scan.py and zap-api-scan.py scripts.

Fix for #5928.

Signed-off-by: Dalley, Karl R <karl.r.dalley@accenture.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ### 2020-04-06
          
          
            
            ### 2020-04-08
          
      
    
    
  

Today is the 8th, and there's already an entry for the 6th.
timeline.author: kingthorin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,9 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the docker containers will be documented in this file.
 
+### 2020-04-06

timeline.bodyText: The I should not be followed by a colon (does not have an argument).
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -152,7 +154,7 @@ def main(argv):
     fail_inprog_count = 0
 
     try:
-        opts, args = getopt.getopt(argv, "t:f:c:u:g:m:n:r:J:w:x:l:hdaijSp:sz:P:D:T:O:", ["hook="])
+        opts, args = getopt.getopt(argv, "t:f:c:u:g:m:n:r:J:w:x:l:hdaijSp:sz:P:D:T:I:O:", ["hook="])

Fix for #5928.
